exceptions.tactic: intros v u l l2 l1 H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros v' u l l2 l1 H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros v' u' l l2 l1 H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros v' u' l' l2 l1 H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros v' u' l' l2' l1 H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros v' u' l' l2' l1' H1 H2 H3 H4.

original: intros v u l l2 l1 H1 H2 H3 H4. apply is_lim_seq_mult' with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2). - apply is_lim_seq_inv with (u := v) (l := l2); auto. - apply is_lim_seq_inv with (u := u) (l := l1); auto. - apply H4.
